comments: He is a very funny guy. All of his test except the final are take-home. You take 3 tests and the final than he drops the lowest of the four. His accent iss a little difficult to understand. Always agree with him and laugh at his jokes. Really cool guy.
He is a decent professor. He knows his information. Textbook use is minimum for this course. There is one huge term paper due at the end.

Economics can be a hard and boring class. But Dr. Akintude made the course fun and enjoyable. Very Funny and cares about the students. Exams are very fair, but that\'s only if you attend class and read the book. If you do what is expected there\'s no doubt in my mind that you\'ll be exempt from the final and get an A. Highly Recommended.
very easy professor....just gotta study or have good friends to cheat together with....got an A....although, he lectures are sometimes hard bc he has an accent....
he is really funny and he gives open book exams and pretty enjoyable classes. he is fun but make sure that you know your stuff.

Economics is boring, but he makes side comments about things that make it funny. But then again, I\'m easily amused. His tests were so easy, just study what lines he told you to memorize. He curves the tests like crazy. But if you don\'t pay attention, he kind of... picks on you that day.
He curves at the end and, at the end, you can get an A. He is Ok but not the best professor. At least, i was not interested in his lectures. His tests are hard, but he is a good grader.
He is a great professor, very fair grader!

He is very funny and that makes waking up on saturdays worth it! He makes the class fun and cares about his student and most of his exams are open book. Fair grader. Just study the chapters that will be on the exam and you can easily get an A.

I have proboem understand his heavy accent, but his exams are consisted of multiple choice questions similar to the ones from the study guide. If you\'ve studied and understand all the problems in the study guide, you will do very well.
good teacher knows his stuff tests are impossibleee give take home final though but cant find answers in book.!!

His accent not very clear, but he\'s someone who shows a genuine interest in his students learning. He irritates very easily though, but he is a great prof. and person. His tests are very difficult though but he gives make up exams and usually gives an important exam as a take home.
Great professor, very easy grader. Better than Zewail.
